summary: A Dark, Cinematic ENB loosely based off of Insomnia ENB
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]The DoF mod used is a very intense one and reduces up to 20 frames. You can either disable it, reduce the quality, or get different enbeffectprepass files.

Screenshots taken with Enhanced lighting and Effects and Climates of Tamriel but they are not required.

Installation

- ENB Series v0.308 (most current ENB), please download the binary files here [/size][url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]mod_tesskyrim[/url][size=3] and extract [/size][b]d3d9.dll[/b][size=3] to your Skyrim folder. (Remove the dll file and try the InjectorVersion if you have any problems with the WrapperVersion - which you shouldnt do, but still, just in case)[/size]

[size=3]- Download my mod and extract the files to your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe is located), and overwrite if asked.[/size]

[size=3]- Open your SkyrimPrefs.ini file located in your "My Documents" folder and make sure these lines are set:[/size]

[size=3]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/size]
[size=3]bDrawLandShadows=1[/size]
[size=3]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/size]
[size=3]iBlurDeferredShadowMask=5 [/size]

[size=3]- Open enblocal.ini and set the VideoMemorySizeMb parameter (e.g. VRAM + RAM - 2048)[/size]

[size=3]- Disable AA in the SkyrimLauncher options[/size]
author: cma1216
